Trial_Design.evidence: The gait of 20 healthy participants (mean age 28.3 years; body mass index 22.9 kg/m 2 ) was analyzed

Participants.evidence: 20 healthy participants (mean age 28.3 years; body mass index 22.9 kg/m 2 )

Intervention.evidence: analyzed with varus and valgus knee brace conditions and without a brace

Objective.evidence: The purpose of this study was to investigate the effect of varus and valgus adjustments to one commercially available unloader knee brace

Method_Outcome.evidence: knee adduction moments and muscle activation during stance

Result_Outcome.evidence: varus (directed cocontraction ratio 0.29, SD 0.21, effect size 0.95, p = 0.315) and valgus (directed cocontraction ratio 0.28, SD 0.24, effect size 0.93, p = 0.315)
